abstract: Amid last week’s market tumult, Mark Cuban, tackled the subject of “How to Get Rich.” His advice may not be a mood-lifter.
snippet: Amid last week’s market tumult, Mark Cuban, tackled the subject of “How to Get Rich.” His advice may not be a mood-lifter.
lead_paragraph: Amid last week’s market tumult, Mark Cuban, chairman of HDNet and owner of the Dallas Mavericks, tackled the subject of “How to Get Rich.” His advice may not be a mood-lifter.

headline.main: Slow Road to Wealth, With ‘No Shortcuts’
headline.print_headline: Slow Road to Wealth, With ‘No Shortcuts’
